section.title: I subscribed to a list using my home email address, but I can't post to the list from work. What do I do to fix this?

body.p: To reduce spam, all of our lists are configured to only allow posts from official subscriber email addresses. Fortunately, mlmmj supports "nomail" subscriptions, allowing you to register alternate email addresses that can be used only for posting to the list. Here's an example of how this works. Let's say you subscribed to the gentoo-dev list as jim@home.com, but you'd also like to post to the list using your james@work.com email address. To do this, send a message (as james@work.com) to gentoo-dev+subscribe-nomail@gentoo.org You should then be allowed to post to gentoo-dev using both your home and work email addresses.
